resources.string:
1. Adding a Workout 
 - Click the Add workout button 
 - Enter the workout name and press ok 

 2. Editing a Workout Name
 - Press and hold the workout that needs editing 
 - Select the Edit Workout option 
 - Enter the new workout name and press ok 

 3. Deleting a Workout 
 - Press and hold the workout that needs to be deleted 
 - Select the Delete Workout option 
 - Confirm the deletion 
 -* Note that this also deletes all associated exercises

1. Adding an Exercise 
 - Click the Add Exercise button 
 - Enter the exercise name and press ok 

 2. Editing an Exercise Name
 - Press and hold the exercise that needs editing 
 - Select the Edit Exercise option 
 - Enter the new exercise name and press ok 

 3. Deleting an Exercise 
 - Press and hold the exercise that needs to be deleted 
 - Select the Delete Exercise option 
 - Confirm the deletion 
 -* Note that this also deletes all associated sets

1. Adding a Set 
 - Click the Add Set button 
 - Enter the number of reps 
 - Enter the amount of weight 
 - Press ok 

 2. Editing a Set 
 - Press and hold the set that needs editing 
 - Select the Edit Set option 
 - Enter the new information for reps or weight 
 - Press ok 

 3. Deleting an Set 
 - Press and hold the set that needs to be deleted 
 - Select the Delete Set option 
 - Confirm the deletion

1. Adding a Max 
 - Click the "+" in the top corner of the screen 
 - Enter the name of the lift 
 - Enter the amount weight lifted 
 - Enter the date when the max was reached 
 - Press ok 

 2. Editing a Max 
 - Press and hold the set that needs editing 
 - Select the Edit Max option 
 - Enter the new information for name, weight, or date 
 - Press ok 

 3. Deleting an Max 
 - Press and hold the max that needs to be deleted 
 - Select the Delete Max option 
 - Confirm the deletion

1. Viewing Sets within an Exercise 
 - Click an exercise to expand it 
 - Click it again to close it 
 
 2. Completing a Set 
 - Press and hold the set that was just completed 
 - Press yes to confirm the completion 
 - Progress bar will increase 
 
 3. Resetting the progress bar 
 - Press the reset button 
 -* Note this will change all sets to not completed
